alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 12:56PM AKST until January 11 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility may be reduced to one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 65 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
